author: siphoned

comment: From what I can gather, the rumors of her being fired are sourced to a couple different places. One is a from a throwaway line in a Forbes article about Emilia Clarke selling a house, where the writer casually mentions that Emilia is replacing Amber. As John Campea pointed out, the writer is a real estate guy and not an entertainment guy, and since that article came out literally no entertainment writers have picked up that story. Most likely he just heard something and repeated it without any verification. The other source that Amber was fired seems to be some minor Australian entertainment site that I've never heard of. Right now, this news should be taken with a pound of salt.
